title: Understanding the Null Hypothesis
text: The null hypothesis is a fundamental concept in statistics. It serves as a starting point for statistical testing. Think about why researchers might want to assume no effect or no relationship between variables initially.

title: Role of Random Chance
text: Consider how random chance can influence the results of an experiment. The null hypothesis helps to determine if the observed effects are due to random variation or if there is a significant relationship.

title: Testing the Null Hypothesis
text: When conducting a statistical test, the null hypothesis is what you are trying to disprove. Think about how this process helps in validating the results of a study.

hintAnswer: A null hypothesis accounts for random chance as the reason for a perceived relationship between variables
title: Identifying the Correct Answer
text: Review the choices and identify which one explains the role of the null hypothesis in accounting for random chance.
